attributes.name: Abominable Maul
attributes.description: "You have not seen the worst of what the deeppits offer until you have seen the destruction done by a Deeppit Abomination."
attributes.parsed_description: "You have not seen the worst of what the deeppits offer until you have seen the destruction done by a Deeppit Abomination."

attributes.name: Abomination's Mandible
attributes.description: "This 'sword' appears to be the sharpened jaw of some massive creature."
attributes.parsed_description: "This 'sword' appears to be the sharpened jaw of some massive creature."

attributes.name: Abomination's Staff
attributes.description: This staff hums in your hands menacingly, as though it is unwilling to perform the task at hand.
attributes.parsed_description: This staff hums in your hands menacingly, as though it is unwilling to perform the task at hand.

attributes.name: Abyssal Conqueror
attributes.description: “The fringes of the void are ever expanding. Without brave adventurers to fight back, this world would be lost."
attributes.parsed_description: “The fringes of the void are ever expanding. Without brave adventurers to fight back, this world would be lost."

attributes.name: Abyssal Strike
attributes.description: "A weapon of justice and holy intent turned into a weapon of malice."
attributes.parsed_description: "A weapon of justice and holy intent turned into a weapon of malice."

attributes.name: Accursed End
attributes.description: "Your destiny was never your own. From the beginning my curse was upon you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Your destiny was never your own. From the beginning my curse was upon you."

attributes.name: Acolyte's Corrupted Fire Staff
attributes.description: "Corrupted acolytes wield a number of powerful magics. Their staves serve as conduits for their limitless power."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corrupted acolytes wield a number of powerful magics. Their staves serve as conduits for their limitless power."

attributes.name: Adept Cryomancer's Gauntlet
attributes.description: A magical gauntlet well-suited to the expertise level of an Adept Cryomancer.
attributes.parsed_description: A magical gauntlet well-suited to the expertise level of an Adept Cryomancer.

attributes.name: Adiana's Adjudicator
attributes.description: "The angry earth is an uncontrollable force driven by one question. Will you harm the earth or make it whole?"
attributes.parsed_description: "The angry earth is an uncontrollable force driven by one question. Will you harm the earth or make it whole?"

attributes.name: Adiana''s Fury
attributes.description: "All the fury of the Angry Earth was channeled through her."
attributes.parsed_description: "All the fury of the Angry Earth was channeled through her."

attributes.name: Adjorjan's Ancestral Life Staff
attributes.description: "This staff was with Adjorjan for millenia. The wonders and horrors it has seen seem unimaginable."
attributes.parsed_description: "This staff was with Adjorjan for millenia. The wonders and horrors it has seen seem unimaginable."

attributes.name: Adjucator of Pain
attributes.description: "Who shall my axe strike? Why must I choose but one of you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Who shall my axe strike? Why must I choose but one of you."

attributes.name: Admiral's Firearm
attributes.description: "The admiral normally preferred a pistol, but sometimes the situation called for a musket."
attributes.parsed_description: "The admiral normally preferred a pistol, but sometimes the situation called for a musket."

attributes.name: Admiral's Musket
attributes.description: "A true weapon for an admiral, this musket was the envy of the fleet."
attributes.parsed_description: "A true weapon for an admiral, this musket was the envy of the fleet."

attributes.name: Adventurer's Bane
attributes.description: "Particularly good at piercing knee armor."
attributes.parsed_description: "Particularly good at piercing knee armor."

attributes.description: A well-made weapon. It will serve you as well as it served its previous wielder.
attributes.parsed_description: A well-made weapon. It will serve you as well as it served its previous wielder.
